requirement_text: Ensure adequate power for sex/gender interaction analyses
Power should be robust to unequal subgroup sizes
Operationalize analysis groups using available CPADS gender categories (Woman/Man/Transgender-Non-binary)
Set primary interaction power on Woman vs Man and retain non-primary groups as explicit feasibility outputs
Capture within-group physiological variability (e.g., hormone-cycle/lifespan indicators) when available
Report subgroup baseline summaries by gender/sex
Use documented eBAC derivation context and legal-threshold mapping
Handle missing anthropometrics in public PUMF by using measured eBAC outputs
Keep observational CPADS analyses clearly non-randomized
Provide prospective stratified block randomization planning artifacts
Anchor eBAC power endpoints to documented Seidl/Widmark formula definitions
